meanings.definition: A container or room with constant humidity used for storing cigars or tobacco.
meanings.sent1: My grandfather keeps his cigars in a humidor to maintain their freshness.
meanings.sent2: The humidor in the cigar shop ensures the cigars stay in perfect condition.
meanings.sent3: When the humidor started singing, we realized someone hid a radio inside!
meanings.sent4: The humidor was a magical box, preserving the cigars like a time capsule.
meanings.sent5: The humidor whispered secrets of the tobacco leaves it held within.

meanings.definition: A device used to regulate humidity levels for cigars.
meanings.sent1: The humidor on the shelf beeps when the humidity gets too high.
meanings.sent2: Every cigar aficionado knows the importance of a good humidor.
meanings.sent3: The humidor decided to take a vacation and left the cigars feeling dry.
meanings.sent4: His humidor was a faithful guardian, protecting the cigars from moisture.
meanings.sent5: The humidor hummed a soothing tune as it maintained the perfect humidity.
